events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery.
Customer support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request case.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m sorry for the inconvenience and here to assist you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund?
Here is my order number 123456 and I have attached a clear photo of the wrong item that arrived instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should receive the money back within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate you handling this so fast.
The refund has now been processed and a confirmation email has been sent to your registered address.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund successfully and if there is anything else we can help with.
As the refund issue is resolved and no further help is needed, we are closing your case. Thank you for contacting us.
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey to help us improve our service.
